oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Algebraic cobordism and flag varieties
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yagita, Nobuaki
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Topology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let X be an algebraic variety over k such that X|K is cellular for the algebraically closed field K over k. Then we study the restriction map CH(X) to CH(X|K) of Chow rings, by using algebraic cobordism theory. In particular, we compute CH(G/T) for twisted flag varieties G/T over k.
